rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer and cloakroom.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to invite natural light, featuring an integrated seating area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for comfortable dining with ample lighting and views of the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped industrial style kitchen with robust finishes and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance ventilation.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area for appliances and storage, ensuring functionality in a multi-level layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with private ensuite bathroom, featuring a skylight and floor-to-ceiling windows facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Cozy guest rooms with adequate space for comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Connected to the master bedroom, providing an outdoor view and fresh air.

openings.description: Connection to the central courtyard for improved natural light and airflow.

rooms.name: Studio Office
rooms.description: Multi-purpose area that can serve as a home office or additional living space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed with ample storage and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Functional bedroom space incorporating industrial design elements.

rooms.name: Hallway Corridor
rooms.description: Connecting corridor between rooms for smooth transition.

openings.description: Provides outdoor access and fresh air.
Industrial style window ensuring natural light.

rooms.name: Studio Loft
rooms.description: An expansive loft area designed for creative endeavors or additional sleeping quarters.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: Quiet space for reading and work with natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom in the upper level ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample natural light.
Additional outdoor space enhancing the loft experience.
